00019 #include "RooFitCore/RooRealVar.hh"
00020 #include "RooFitCore/RooNumber.hh"

00023 class BdkDalitz {
00024 public:
00025   // Static members: ---------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027   enum Mode {PPP0 = 1,    // D -> pi+ pi- pi0
00028              KPP0 = 2,    // D -> K+ pi- pi0
00029              KKP0 = 3,    // D -> K+ K- pi0
00030              PPK0 = 4,    // D -> p+ pi- Ks
00031              KKK0 = 5,    // D -> K+ K- Ks
00032              KPK0 = 6};   // D -> K- pi+ Ks
00033 
00034   static const Double_t D0MASS;
00035   static const Double_t PI0MASS;
00036   static const Double_t PIMASS;
00037   static const Double_t KMASS;
00038   static const Double_t K0MASS;
00039   static const Double_t ETAMASS;
00040   
00041   // In Flavor, values correspond to the kaon charge in the dominant B decay:
00042   enum Flavor {D0 = -1, D0BAR = 1};
00043 
00044 
00045   // Dalitz variables (m12, m13, m23) are the *squared* invariant masses
00046 
00047   static Bool_t inDalitz(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00048                          Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00049 
00050   static Bool_t inDalitzBounds(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00051                                Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00052 
00053   static Double_t m13Max(Double_t m12, Double_t M, 
00054                          Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00055   
00056   static Double_t m13Min(Double_t m12, Double_t M, 
00057                          Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00058 
00059   static Double_t m12Max(Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00060                          Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00061   
00062   static Double_t m12Min(Double_t m13, Double_t M, 
00063                          Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00064 
00065   static Double_t m13MaxLimit(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) {
00066     return (M-m2)*(M-m2);
00067   }
00068   static Double_t m13MinLimit(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) {
00069     return (m1+m3)*(m1+m3);
00070   }
00071   static Double_t m12MaxLimit(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) {
00072     return (M-m3)*(M-m3);
00073   }
00074   static Double_t m12MinLimit(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) {
00075     return (m1+m2)*(m1+m2);
00076   }
00077 
00078   static TGraph* drawBoundary(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, 
00079                               Double_t m3, Int_t points = 100);
00080 
00081   static Bool_t weightBins(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3,
00082                            TH2* h, Bool_t weightContent = kTRUE,
00083                            Double_t step = 0.001);
00084 
00085   static Int_t inDalitzDataSet(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3,
00086                                const RooAbsData& data, const RooRealVar& m12, const RooRealVar& m13,
00087                                Bool_t useVetoWindow = kTRUE, Bool_t verbose = kFALSE);
00088 
00090   static Double_t mOtherVal(Double_t d1, Double_t d2, Double_t M, 
00091                             Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) {
00092     return (M*M + m1*m1 + m2*m2 + m3*m3 - d1 - d2);
00093   }
00094 
00096   static Bool_t inM23Veto(Double_t m12, Double_t m13,
00097                           Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3);
00098 
00100   inline static Double_t m23VetoMin() { 
00101     return (_m23VetoMass ? _m23VetoMass->getMin()*_m23VetoMass->getMin() 
00102             : -RooNumber::infinity);
00103   }
00105   inline static Double_t m23VetoMax() {
00106     return (_m23VetoMass ? _m23VetoMass->getMax()*_m23VetoMass->getMax()
00107             : RooNumber::infinity);
00108   }
00110   inline static Bool_t hasM23Veto() { 
00111     return (_m23VetoMass && _m23VetoMass->hasMin() && _m23VetoMass->hasMax());
00112   }
00113

00116

00118   static RooRealVar* _m23VetoMass;

00123             BdkDalitz::Mode DdecMode = BdkDalitz::PPP0);

00130   void setMasses(Double_t M, Double_t m1, Double_t m2, Double_t m3) 
00131      {_M = M; _m1 = m1; _m2 = m2, _m3 = m3; }
00132   
00133   inline Bool_t inDalitz(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) const {
00134     return inDalitz(m12, m13, _M, _m1, _m2, _m3);

00146   Double_t m13Min(Double_t m12) const {return m13Min(m12, _M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00147   Double_t m12Max(Double_t m13) const {return m12Max(m13, _M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00148   Double_t m12Min(Double_t m13) const {return m12Min(m13, _M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00149 
00151   Double_t m13MaxLimit() const {return m13MaxLimit(_M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00153   Double_t m13MinLimit() const {return m13MinLimit(_M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00155   Double_t m12MaxLimit() const {return m12MaxLimit(_M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }
00157   Double_t m12MinLimit() const {return m12MinLimit(_M, _m1, _m2, _m3); }

00168   }

00171                     Double_t step = 0.001) const {

00173   }

00175   Int_t inDalitzDataSet(const RooAbsData& data, const RooRealVar& m12, const RooRealVar& m13,
00176                         Bool_t useVetoWindow = kTRUE, Bool_t verbose = kFALSE) const {
00177     return inDalitzDataSet(_M, _m1, _m2, _m3, data, m12, m13, useVetoWindow, verbose);
00178   }
00179 
00180   Double_t mOtherVal(Double_t d1, Double_t d2) const {
00181     return mOtherVal(d1, d2, _M, _m1, _m2, _m3);
00182   }
00183 
00184 
00185   BdkDalitz::Flavor flavor() const {return _flavor;}
00186   BdkDalitz::Mode getDdecMode() const { return _DdecMode; }
00187 
00188   Double_t M()  const {return _M;}
00189   Double_t m1() const {return _m1;}
00190   Double_t m2() const {return _m2;}
00191   Double_t m3() const {return _m3;}
00192 
00193 protected:
00194   BdkDalitz::Flavor _flavor;                
00195   Double_t _M, _m1, _m2, _m3;     // defines Dalitz boundaries
00196

00198   BdkDalitz::Mode _DdecMode;  // D decay mode
00199 
00200   ClassDef (BdkDalitz,0)      // Dalitz base class
